Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that connects two students using a string.
The student can illustrate how sound travels through the string to communicate between students.
The student can show the distance between the two students in their drawing.
The student can depict how the string carries the sound from one student's cup to the other's.
The student can demonstrate how this device helps people communicate over a distance.
The student can only use the materials specified (e.g., cups, strings) in the drawing.
